verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: paid] [ARG1: a Memorial Day tribute] [ARGM-LOC: at Arlington National Cemetery] [ARG2: to those who have fallen in battle or while protecting a nation forever thankful for their selfless service] .
President Donald Trump paid a Memorial Day tribute at Arlington National Cemetery to those who [V: have] fallen in battle or while protecting a nation forever thankful for their selfless service .

President Donald Trump paid a Memorial Day tribute at Arlington National Cemetery to [ARG1: those] [R-ARG1: who] have [V: fallen] [ARGM-LOC: in battle] or while protecting a nation forever thankful for their selfless service .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] paid a Memorial Day tribute at Arlington National Cemetery to those who have fallen in battle or while [V: protecting] [ARG1: a nation forever thankful for their selfless service] .
